00028                      virtual public i2d::ICalibrationProvider
00029 {
00030 public:
00031        typedef iproc::TSupplierCompWrap< std::pair<const i2d::ITransformation2d*, const iimg::IBitmap*> > BaseClass;
00032 
00033        I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(CDelegatedBitmapSupplierComp);
00034               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(IBitmapProvider);
00035               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(i2d::ICalibrationProvider);
00036               I_ASSIGN(m_inputBitmapProviderCompPtr, "SlaveSupplier", "Slave supplier where all calls will be delegated", false, "SlaveSupplier");
00037               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_inputBitmapProviderModelCompPtr, m_inputBitmapProviderCompPtr, false);
00038               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_calibrationProviderCompPtr, m_inputBitmapProviderCompPtr, false);
00039               I_ASSIGN(m_bitmapCompPtr, "BitmapObject", "Bitmap object used if no slave supplier is provided", false, "BitmapObject");
00040               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_bitmapModelCompPtr, m_bitmapCompPtr, false);
00041               I_ASSIGN(m_calibrationCompPtr, "CalibrationObject", "Calibration object used as image to log transformation, if no slave supplier is provided", false, "CalibrationObject");
00042               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_calibrationModelCompPtr, m_calibrationCompPtr, false);
00043        I_END_COMPONENT;
00044

00049        // reimplemented (i2d::ICalibrationProvider)
00050        virtual const i2d::ITransformation2d* GetLogicalTransform() const;
